I’ll start by collecting the latest public posts that mention the hashtag, check our current brand reputation score, and then analyse the overall sentiment.

arguments.text: #AcmePriceHike just happened. Why did Acme raise prices by 30%? This is unacceptable! Seeing the #AcmePriceHike trend. Customers deserve a clear explanation before they decide to jump ship. I love Acme products but the #AcmePriceHike is a blow. Any chance of a discount?

arguments.claim: Acme increased product prices by 30% without prior notice

messages.content: {"rating":"Partially True","sources":[{"title":"Acme Press Release Oct 2025","url":"https://acme.com/press/price-update"}],"explanation":"Acme announced a 20% price increase for its flagship line effective Nov 1, but some regional distributors applied an additional 10% surcharge without prior notice, leading to the perception of a 30% increase."}

Sentiment analysis shows a strong negative polarity (‑0.62) with anger and frustration dominating. The brand score drop aligns with this sentiment. Fact‑check confirms the claim is **Partially True** – the official increase was 20%, but a regional surcharge made it appear as 30% for many customers.

I’ll draft a transparent response that acknowledges the misunderstanding, explains the pricing decision, and offers a limited‑time discount to affected customers. Before publishing, I’ll run a quick legal review.

arguments.crisis_summary: Customers are reacting to a perceived 30% price increase after Acme’s recent pricing announcement. The official increase was 20%, but an additional regional surcharge created confusion.

messages.content:
"We hear you. Recent changes to our pricing have caused confusion, and we want to clear it up. On October 28, Acme announced a 20% price increase for our flagship line, effective November 1. Some regional distributors added a temporary 10% surcharge that was not communicated in advance, leading to the impression of a 30% hike. This was not our intention.

To address this, we are offering a 15% discount on all flagship products for the next two weeks for customers who were affected by the surcharge. We are also improving our communication process to ensure any future changes are clearly explained ahead of time.

Thank you for your continued trust in Acme. We remain committed to delivering value and transparency."
Now I’ll run a legal review of the drafted statement to ensure it contains no liability issues.
